page.title: 09MY HOMELIFE NEAR LONGNEWTON
page.content: I LIVE AT{BRACKSTONE HOUSE},DARLINGTON BACK LANE,WHINNEY HILL NEAR LONGNEWTON.MY FRIEND LIVES QUITE CLOSE TO ME.WHEN WE HAVE WORK TO DO MY FRIEND SOMETIMES HELPS. I HAVE SOME PETS.ONE IS A RABBIT, THE OTHER IS A HORSE.{OUR HOME IS A {FARM}AND OUR MAIN ANIMALS ARE PIGS.MY HOMELIFE IS VERY HARD BECAUSE OF THE WORK. WE HAVE ABOUT{TWO ACRES}OF LAND.WE RENT IT OUT FOR SILAGE AND GRAZING.WE HAVE AN ORCHARD WHICH GROWS COOKING APPLES.I WORK ON MY GRANDAD'S FARM, LOOKING AFTER THE PIGS. I HAVE A{RECORD PLAYER,TELEVISION AND A{VIDEO GAMES SYSTEM}.I PLAY WITH THESE IN MY SPARE TIME.I SHARE THESE WITH MY BROTHER.
